def_cn: 挨家挨户送牛奶的工作
def_en: If someone has a milk round, they work as a milkman, going from house to house delivering milk.

def_cn: （每年一度的）校园招聘，巡回招聘
def_en: The milk round is an event that happens once a year when people from large companies visit colleges and universities and interview students who are interested in working for them.
